mapper.select: select qna_reply_no, qna_no, qna_reply_content, qna_reply_name ,to_char(qna_reply_writeday, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as qna_reply_writeday from qna_reply where qna_no = #{qna_no} order by qna_reply_no desc
mapper.delete: /*Reply - replyDelete*/ delete from qna_reply where qna_reply_no = #{qna_reply_no}
